refentry:
$Date$ $Revision$
elements modespec modespec Element
modespec &modespec.purpose;
&modespec.synopsis.gen; Description
ModeSpec contains application-specific instructions required to process an OLink. See OLink.
Processing expectations
&format.suppress; This element provides data for processing but is not expected to be rendered directly.
&modespec.parents.gen; &modespec.children.gen;
Attributes
application
Application indicates the nature of the action required to complete the OLink. Application must be a notation declared in the &DTD;.
Examples
For examples, see &modespec.example.seealso.gen;.
